about_the_game:
Danse Macabre: A Revolutionary AI-Powered Text RPG - Immerse Yourself in a World of Intrigue, Deceit, and Mystery


Embrace the Future of Gaming with the World's First AI-driven RPG - Available Now for FREE on Early Access!

🔥 Welcome to Danse Macabre, a groundbreaking text-based RPG where every NPC is powered by state-of-the-art Artificial Intelligence, ChatGPT! Experience the thrill of true interactive storytelling as each character comes to life with dynamic, unique responses to your every words. Are you ready to dive into an immersive world of deception, danger, and dark secrets?

🕰️ Unravel a gripping tale set in the 14th century as you investigate the chilling assassination of Duke Friedrich II von Habsburg. Step into the shoes of a brave Inquisitor and navigate the shadowy halls of the Abbey of Neuberg, Austria, where evil lurks around every corner and the devil hides in the details.

💬 Engage in captivating conversations with NPCs that adapt and react to your choices in real-time. Utilize the power of ChatGPT to uncover secrets, and outwit your enemies. The possibilities are endless!

🎮 Early Access - Be among the first to experience the future of gaming! As an early access title, only the first chapter is currently available, with 8 more acts coming soon. By playing, you're helping to shape the evolution of AI-driven gaming and supporting an innovative community of developers.

💰 FREE & Open Source - Danse Macabre is dedicated to pushing the boundaries of gaming, which is why it's absolutely FREE and open source! Access the source code on github and join the growing community of players, developers, and enthusiasts.

🎲 From Tabletop to PC - Adapted from the beloved tabletop RPG Prima - Danse Macabre, also free and open source. Experience a seamless transition from the physical world to the digital realm as you embark on an unforgettable adventure.

Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity to become part of gaming history. Download Danse Macabre today and immerse yourself in a world where the line between game and reality blurs, and your choices truly matter.

Join the revolution - Try Danse Macabre now! 💀💀

Note : This game is not related in any way to the Danse Macabre collection by Big Fish Games

content_descriptors.notes: This game is a horror game. It is literally called "Danse Macabre". There will be murders, blood, poison, devil worshipping and tons and tons of skeletons.
